markdownRemark.html:
Adam Lehman of Adobe gave a couple of presentations on ColdFusion 8 yesterday in Jacksonville. I went to the one he gave at the JaxFusion user group yesterday.

Adam will be giving the same presentation tomorrow at the Tampa ColdFusion User Group. The meeting location is by the airport in Tampa at the International Academy of Design and Technology.

frontmatter.title: Adam Lehman presenting at the Tampa ColdFusion User Group tomorrow
Added Spry Web Service calls to my Quote pages
Added 'My Pictures' section to my site
